transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir good afternoon main rishu baat kar rahi hun sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir wo kal maine aapko detail bata diya tha export wala na agar aap usko convert karana chahte hain to bataye sir matlab dekhiye sir mere ko bhi teen se char din ho gaye hain sir aapka ye mere paas to matlab ek issue chal raha hai agar sir dekho maine bata diya refund to possible nahi hai sir baki aap mujhe batao agar export mein convert karna chahte ho to main aapka remaining amount adjust karke aapko export ka detail bhej deti hun aur agar aap nahi chahte hain sir export mein convert karna to fir mere ko ye concern sir close karna rahega aap mere ko matlab further ispe hum matlab koi wo nahi kar sakte sir further.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aap bataye sir.
Customer: Support nahi kar sakte matlab jo aap.
Executive: Sir refund sir sir as per policy refund nahi ho sakta hai sir.
Customer: Madam aapka policy matlab wohi samajh mein nahi aa raha hai aap koi customer ko return kar rahe ho kisi ko nahi kar rahe ho bol rahe ho hamari policy nahi hai aapki policy mein matlab kya hai khali customer ko operation karna.
Executive: Sir aapko kisi ne return mein diya hai sir ki aapko refund ho jayega.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapko kisi ne return mein ye communication kiya tha ki aapko refund ho jayega aapka amount.
Customer: Madam abhi aapke waha se ek aadmi to phone karta nahi hai pehla to.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur aur aap log kuch writing mein to dete nahi ho.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Mera jo baat hua tha maine maine jabhi is time madam aap jabhi ye export pe hai na aap rehte hai na ye project teen saal ka tabhi bhi mere ko writing mein nahi diya tha yaha pe office ja ke wo sab online hi kiya tha humne.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Call pe baat hoti hai aur computer pe chat hoti hai barabar nahi to mere ko mail nahi aata.
Executive: Proposol to aata hai na sir proposol approve kar tabhi payment hoti hai.
Customer: Are madam wohi main bol raha hun na sara cheez online hota hai aur aaj ki din mein matlab aapke waha se abhi 20 logo ne abhi tak mere sath kareeban 20 logo ne baat kiya hai main itna kaam karta hun to mere ko har ek ka naam details ko to yaad nahi rahega ki mere ko ye bande ne is date ko aise baat kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo to mere ko yaad nahi rahega na mere ko us time ye proof manga tha maine usko proof whatsapp pe diya tha to usne bola theek hai sir main ek bar check kara ke aapko return kar denge uske baad wo bande ka nahi to koi phone lag raha tha nahi to kuch details mil rahi hai aur nahi to hamare paas itna time rehta hai ki hum log per day isko follow up kare.
Executive: Sir baat aapki bilkul theek hai lekin sir aap.
Customer: Abhi aap bol rahe ho ki mere ko 100 ke stamp ke upar likha hua chahiye to wo to nahi rahega na madam.
Executive: Sir wo nahi but aapne aapko kisi ne kahin pe to communication diya hoga na ki.
Customer: Haan to wohi to main bol raha hun madam ki mera jo baat hua tha na main pehle main shuruwat mein jab ye teen saal ka hua na pehle maine char panch mahina continue service use kiya tha.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Barabar lekin jaise jaise mere ko problem face aana hua na maine complaint chalu kiya ki mere ko ye problem aa raha hai mere ko aap isme ye karke do ye karke do uske baad ek banda tha usne thoda kaam bhi kiya tha lekin uske baad wo banda chala gaya koi naya person aaya tha uske baad koi nahi kaam ho raha tha ha ho jayega aapko main sunday ko ring karti hun monday ko ring karte hai kabhi one ladies ko main phone karti thi kabhi koi gents phone karta tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Barabar main abhi time mere paas time nahi hai to aapko baad mein phone karte hai ye sab answer hota raha.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: To uske baad maine bhai bol diya ki mere ko ye karna hi nahi hai aap mere ko mera refund karwa do uske baad jo bhi person tha usne bola.
Executive: Main aapko service deti hun sir aapko service mein dikkat nahi aayegi.
Customer: Wohi to madam wohi to madam dekho abhi aap ghum fir ke ek hi cheez mein aayegi to fir madam kaam to hone wala hai nahi.
Executive: Sir dekho aapko account manager hai jo wo aapko regular follow up wagera karenge usme dikkat nahi aayegi.
Customer: Madam aap meri baat suniye aapki kya main aapka kya aap matlab itna bharosa de rahi hai to aapka pehle to madam ek cheez hoti hai company mein ek account manager hota hai uska hai na ek regular timing hota hai wo hume follow aapki jagah main teen saal ka main service use kar raha hun kareeban char se panch to manager change ho gaye hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Abhi kya main isko kiske sath follow up lu har bar naya management aata hai to har ek ko puri kahani sunao utna thodi time rehta hai.
Executive: Kisi ko nahi sunana hai sir meri dekhiye aapka account shivam dekhte hain main unhi ki manager baat kar rahi hun agar aapka unse connect nahi ho pata hai.
Customer: Madam abhi shivam dekh raha hai abhi shivam dekh raha hai usse pehle koi aur tha uske pehle koi aur tha uske pehle koi aur thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aap samjho barabar mere paas itna time nahi rehta hai hum bhi business leke baithe hai aisa to nahi hai madam ki aap cheez dal diya to hum khali IndiaMART hi dhanda kare.
Executive: Ji bilkul sir aap.
Customer: Khali iske upar baithe rahenge to fir madam mera dusra bhi kaam nahi hoga na.
Executive: Sir aapke.
Customer: Ye to ye kya maine ek mera acche business ke liye kiya chalo ek saal mein mere ko acha response mila hai is saal mein maine itna paisa nikala hai to mujhe chance hai ki main teen saal mein usse bhi jyada business grow kar paunga but mujhe itna nahi idea tha us time pe ki IndiaMART mere sath aisa khelega.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Otherwise main itna main itna karta hi nahi aur abhi bhi abhi bhi main aapko main bata raha hun madam mere sath ek bhi person abhi main aapse theek se baat kar raha hun baki maine ek bhi person se itna lamba baat nahi kiya hai kyunki mujhe time pass karne ke liye mere ko time hi nahi hai madam aap samjho ye mera total time waste ho raha hai aap samjho aap bol rahe ho ki aap aapka concern close kar dogi mere ko malum hai last mein ghum fir ke yahi hone wala hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Barabar but main ek ek bharose ke sath abhi ho gaya ki IndiaMART hai na totally fraud company hai customer ko bewakoof banata hai wo ye final hai abhi to ye cheez mere liye to final ho chuki hai kyunki aap bol rahe ho ki hamari policy mein nahi hai to aapki policy mein madam aap koi main mere paas to already ek reference hai jisne paisa.
Executive: Sir ek kaam karte hain aap one month ke liye main account manager ko ya fir aapke paas mera whatsapp number bhi aa gaya hai sir aap service use karke dekhte hain na sir agar waha pe aapko jo bhi problem aa rahi hai aapko jaise product changes karane hai main wo karwa deti hun aapko kuch aur dikkat aa rahi hai aap wo bataye main wo solve karwa deti hun aapko wo cheeze karke dekho na sir aapko fayda to bilkul dekho sir jab pehle mila hai service mein fayda to abhi bhi milega aisa to nahi hai ki na platform change ho gaya hai sir platform to wohi hai aapne aapne uses isliye band kar diya ki shayad aapko utna support supportive cheeze nahi lagi to usko sir ek bar sir ek bar to sabhi ko chance dena chahiye to main bol rahi hun aapko ek request kar rahi hun.
Customer: Madam ek chance ka ek time hota hai ek confirmation hota hai time chance kabhi itna chance mile madam aap batao mere ko maine already jitne person aaye sabko ek ek chance sabko ek ek chance diya hai.
Executive: Service ki request hi kar rahi hun baki sir dekho baki aap aap better jante ho apni firm ke regarding main aapko request hi kar sakti hun sir aapne matlab main aapko yahi bol rahi hun sir ki ek mahine mein sir ek mahine mein kuch aapko ho sakta hai sir kuch acha business mil jaye aapki problem solve hogi to aapko khud interest aayega service use karne ka aur aap aapko sir matlab cheeze wo jo past mein hui hai wo bhi shayad aapko matlab aap utna mind nahi karoge kyunki kahin na kahin sir dekho aapne jo investment kiya hai wo return ke liye kiya hai aur agar aapko return mil jayega usme se to fir koi dikkat hi nahi hogi na sir to main yahi cheez aapko bol rahi hun.
Customer: Us hisab se to kaam mein mujhe nahi lag raha hai ki hum log kaam karenge na IndiaMART mein to mera return chutega uska reason main aapko bata deta hun kyunki ye abhi jo ho raha hai na kaam waha se IndiaMART se wo totally fraud product wasting ka kaam ho raha hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir main samajh gayi aapki baat lekin dekhiye sir dono cheezon mein matlab refund to main refund possible hota to main kara kara deti aapka refund nahi possible hai.
Executive: Wohi wohi wohi to main bol raha hun ki nahi aapka aisa policy hai ki aap bol rahe ho ki hum log refund hi nahi karwate maine proof manga to proof bhi submit kiya hua hai to ye policy.
Executive: Sir proof sir proof bataya mere ko de dijiye aap whatsapp pe koi proof hai to aapke paas mera whatsapp number hai aapke paas aap de dijiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapko kya kisi ne bola hai refund ka mere ko de dijiye wo proof de dijiye.
Customer: Refund kisi ka bola nahi aap bol rahe ho ki hamari policy mein refund nahi hai main aisa company sakta hun ki wo bande ne refund liya hua hai.
Executive: Dekhiye agar koi aisi cheez hai jo hamari taraf se galat hui hai sir wo usme hum refund ho sakta hai hua hua wo initially.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo mera khaas friend hai usi ka same hi concern tha ki usne package usne to mere se bhi bada package liya tha.
Executive: Aap mujhe company name bataye sir.
Customer: JK Enterprise.
Executive: JK Enterprises kahan ka kahan ke client hai sir wo.
Customer: Ye wapi ka hi hai Mr. Jignesh Kamaliya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer says multiple managers changed.

- Customer says no work is being done.



Resolution:

- Executive said refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to convert to export plan.

- Executive requested to try service for a month.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share proof of refund commitment.



Alert (If Any):

refund, complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, customer service, policy
